includedAssets.title: Taken
includedAssets.synopsis: When sex-trafficking scum snatch his teenage daughter in Paris, retired US secret serviceman Liam Neeson launches a one-man rescue mission - and takes no prisoners. Lost's Maggie Grace is the victim and Famke Janssen her fretful mum, but subtlety and nuance are collateral damage in a bullet-spraying, bone-splintering adrenalin rush that makes watching 24 like taking a stroll down the Champs Elysees.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When his daughter is kidnapped, ex-CIA agent Liam Neeson uses his deadly skills to track her down. Relentless action thriller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When sex-trafficking scum snatch his teenage daughter in Paris, retired US secret serviceman Liam Neeson launches a one-man rescue mission - and takes no prisoners. Lost's Maggie Grace is the victim and Famke Janssen her fretful mum, but subtlety and nuance are collateral damage in a bullet-spraying, bone-splintering adrenalin rush that makes watching 24 like taking a stroll down the Champs Elysees.

includedAssets.title: Taken 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Liam Neeson returns as an ex-CIA agent, this time relying on the skills of daughter Maggie Grace to escape kidnappers.

includedAssets.title: Taken 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Ex-covert operative Liam Neeson must draw upon his particular set of skills when he's framed for the murder of his ex-wife.

includedAssets.title: Taken Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Former CIA operative Bryan Mills (Liam Neeson), is forced to use his deadly and efficient set of skills to rescue his daughter, battle human traffickers and uncover a plot to frame him for murder. Hit action series from the director of Léon.

includedIn.shortSynopsis: Ethan Hunt and his team of Impossible Missions Force (IMF) agents take up the tasks deemed too complex, difficult and dangerous for other agencies.
